thread.title_full: Nebraska student sports wild haircut at basketball game | Daily Mail Online

author: Kelly Mclaughlin For Mailonline
title: Nebraska student sports wild haircut at basketball game | Daily Mail Online
text: 'If he shaves it, his jaw will fall off!' Internet goes wild for student's bizarre 360-degree hairstyle The student was spotted at the school's basketball game on Wednesday night The fellow students in the photo, including a basketball player, appeared unfazed by the unique hairstyle KGIN-TV Sports Director Kevin Sjuts posted the photo on Twitter and his followers were quick to poke fun at the haircut They suggest that the student lost a bet, was being hazed or fell asleep at a party
